channel.title: Linux OS. Need a few things please
channel.description:
Title is pretty obvious. I'm on Ubuntu 12.04 and Wine really doesn't like it. If anyone could give me the contents for compile/run shell scripts for a PI server and a client. Also is needed for the signlink folder within the client files.
Also, can someone get me the code for signlink.java so it looks for cache in user home (I think its ("user.home") ) but I'm not sure. Yes that is a client question but it isn't worth an entire topic.

item.title: Linux OS. Need a few things please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:450638”]oh god…

Java is available for all platforms, and you absolutely do not, and should not need/use wine.[/quote]

You didn’t seem to understand my issue.
I need the shell files for my compilers runners.
I tried installing threw windows version VIA Wine. But it hates me.
I don’t know how else to state it.

Read full topic
item.source: Linux OS. Need a few things please
